name: diGO
description:
A colored and redesigned version of the Chrome dino run game.

This game is a collaboration with Den Orlov. his coding skills is what made the game fully workable. I really appreciate his skills. 

It is made with Python/Pygame, and for pixel arts i used Aseprite.

(if you are having any issue with the game, a short feedback would help us to solve it)

Thanks for your time, Enjoy diGO...
